Rule.Name: At SLA violation risk

<name>Send</name> <param name="userid" order="0">user.OracleSystemUser</param> <param name="method" order="1">SMTP</param> with Order price ofo]]></text><DatasetSystemField><![CDATA[_OrderPrice]]></DatasetSystemField><text><![CDATA[ is at risk of SLA violation. Please take corrective action.]]></text></SubjectText><AlertOwner><![CDATA[-1]]></AlertOwner><Type><![CDATA[Message]]></Type><MessageText><DatasetSystemField><![CDATA[_OrderID]]></DatasetSystemField><text><![CDATA[ for ]]></text><DatasetSystemField><![CDATA[_CustomerID]]></DatasetSystemField><text><![CDATA[ with order price of ]]></text><DatasetSystemField><![CDATA[_OrderPrice]]></DatasetSystemField><text><![CDATA[ is at risk of SLA violation.
